credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Dexter J. Purinton
title: Game of Yellowstone No. 1122
medium: Laminated paper, photomechanical reproductions, cardboard box
description: Deck of playing cards illustrating the sights of Yellowstone National Park. Uniform decoration on backs of buffalo and wild flowers. Gray cardboard box with gilded lettering and one card listing other games by the same company.
name: Playing cards
